name: exlimii
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- w0
-| wex(s0, w1)
-| wi(wex(s0, w1), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| wex(s0, w1)
-| wi(wex(s0, w1), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w1), w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w1, w0)

comment: Inference associated with ~ exlimi . Inferring a theorem when it is implied by an antecedent which may be true. (Contributed by BJ, 15-Sep-2018.)
